AtomarSignature The Signatur is the characteristic which desides, which Units can be converted to each other.
AtomarUnit The AtomarUnit is the part of the Unit, which knows all facts about the unit like name of the unit and its AtomarSignature
To get to know more about the use of units see Unit.
